events.name: Weekly Labs
events.description:
ShockSoc's regular Lab sessions.
Bring your own stuff to work on, pick up one of our projects, or start work on something new.
Our lab sessions are open to everyone.

events.name: Meet ShockSoc
events.description: For those not planning on going out this evening why not drop by P/T/005, grab a drink, and chat with us about engineering, projects, or just life in general.

events.name: Building Bridges
events.description: Teams will compete to build the best bridges with the materials provided. We'll then test them in fun and interesting ways.

events.name: The C Language
events.description: Guiseppe will discuss the fundamentals of C, its' basic functions, and common pratfalls.

events.name: Pumpkins - Part 1
events.description:
Right in time for Halloween, we'll be building Neopixel Pumpkins.
In this session, you'll be introduced to the Pumpkin, components, and Surface Mount soldering.

events.name: Catapults!
events.description:
Come along for some catapult-related chaos!
In teams, build a catapult and complete challenges.

events.name: Pumpkins - Part 2
events.description:
Electric boogaloo!
In which we finish building Pumpkins.

events.name: Haloween Event
events.description:
Our spookiest event of the year.
Further details TBA!

events.name: Rockets
events.description: Celebrate the end of Term with some Rockets.
